page.title: 20BASSETTS
page.content: {Bassetts}make sweets like liqourice Allsorts, Jelly Babies, Wine Gums, Sherbert Fountains, Popcorn and Dolly Mixtures. All this is known a sugar confectionary. {Bassetts}employ 2000 people, only 1500 of these people actually work in the factory, the other 500 go out and sell the products. 250 of the factory employees are men who do the maintenance and heavy work. The other 1250 workers are women who do most of the light sweetmaking work. The sweet operators can work three five hour shifts. The jobs don't get boring because they rotate the work. There are hygiene rules like wearing special clothes and no nail polish. The thing we found amazing was how quickly they make the sweets. The sweets are great !
